prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Chromatic Percussion are all present in this song, but Piano is not.
